Declaration list 1: RefinerAI only acts as a platform provider and assumes no responsibility for this.
Declaration list 2: The AI models provided are third-party. Please exercise caution before transmitting text data.
Declaration list 3: Avoid entering personal privacy, confidential information, or sensitive content to prevent data leakage or misuse.
Declaration list 4: Content generated by AI may not be entirely accurate, may be biased, or may infringe on privacy. Please verify independently and exercise caution before relying on AI for decision-making assistance.
Gemini Reminder: The free service limitations of Gemini provided by Google are strict, and users may be deemed by Google to be circumventing their free quota limits by using multiple keys, which is not recommended.
